alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 3:25AM MST until January 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains and La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
